item.title: about
item.description:
I was looking for a blogging platform that gave me more control over its presentation and hosting. I like the idea of a self-hosted solution, but really didn’t want to have to worry about maintenance.

I looked at Jekyll a while ago, along with Github Pages, and was extremely interested. I hosted a couple projects, like my condo’s website, on Github Pages and it worked great. Zero headache, zero downtime, zero maintenance, zero cost.

I have a Digital Ocean host, and am still interested in using it for something like Discourse, but for blogging and just recording text I might want to look up later, it all seemed too complex.
